hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated on thp authority of Abu Huraira through another chain of transmitters (with these words):" He who followed it (the bier) till he (the dead) is buried

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْجَنَازَةِ وَاتِّبَاعِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of offering the funeral prayer and following the bier
